Posts.Content: lisaaemmaa wrote: I am 15 from Australia but currently on a cruise in Europe, I recently woke up from a nap and about 10 minutes later realised their was blood on my tshirt. After a quick examination it seemed to be blood coming from my areola, I think from a bump on my areola. Several hours later my areola is still bleeding, i have a family history of breast cancer so just worried. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: bleeding from areola lisaaemmaa MTwoman
